attributes.additional_details:
There are murmors that corruption is rife and the media is covering it up/ not reporting on the issue; in light of what has happened with the press and the BBC most notably in the last 18 months I think it is imperative to investigate these claims.

Its also absurd that the tax payers sould have to foot the bill; if West ham want the stadium they should pay cash for the site and also any subsequent work to alter the stadium in any way. Cuts are being made across the board and the stadium is an asset we can use to recoup some money.
